Text.Page:
You see these poor souls? Not napping! The sickness makes them writhe in pain! I'm doing all I can do.

You? You can bring plants for medicine. I've tried plants from all overâ€”now it's time to try something local. Spiritlace, it's called. Grows north of here.

You pick the flowers; I heal the faeries. Got it?

Spiritlace will ease the pain. With my alchemical skills, I bet I can make something to cure the sickness, too.

Good thing you brought so much!
Spiritlace. Little flower on the ground. Get picking!
